help:
Read all about the new Green-Coins system in the Shop! (press F6)
All the commands you will need are replaced by the shop already, but here they are anyway.
Login and logout: (using left4green.com account) /gclogin [email] [password] OR /gclogin [nick] [password]
/gclogout
Link and delink: (use this for auto-login, need to /login first) /linkgclogin [email] [password] OR /linkgclogin [nick] [password]
/delink
Get amount of Green-Coins: /greencoins /greencoins [player]
Toggle GC counter: /gc
